JETTQ.LED
Class LEDManager

java.lang.Object
  JETTQ.LED.LEDManager

public class LEDManager
extends java.lang.Object

The LEDManager class handles the use of the LEDs.

Author:
JETTQ [jettq@wpi.edu]
